Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Provides for recovery of economic development awards in cases where the recipient relocates outside the state
Summary: Provides for the recovery of an economic development award in any case where a recipient relocates outside the state within five years of receiving such award; requires repayment of any such award shall be made pursuant to the timeframe specified in the award agreement.
LawCode: Amd ยง100, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to including among the commissioner's duties a mandate to include in all economic development subsidy agreements provisions allowing the state to recover previously issued awards from fund recipients in the event of relocation outside the state
